text: satyaniṣēdhikaḷilēkku pēāya niṅṅaḷuṭe bhāryamārkku nalkiya vivāhamūlyaṁ niṅṅaḷkku tiriccukiṭṭāte naṣṭappeṭukayuṁ enniṭṭ niṅṅaḷ anantara naṭapaṭi svīkarikkukayuṁ ceytāl āruṭe bhāryamārāṇēā naṣṭappeṭṭat avar nalkiya vivāhamūlyattinu tulyamāya tuka avarkku nalkuka. niṅṅaḷ viśvasiccaṅgīkaricca allāhuvēāṭ bhaktiyuḷḷavarāvuka
